text: Softly, Softly may refer to: * Softly, Softly (TV series), a 1966-1969 British police drama series ** Softly, Softly: Taskforce, a 1969-1976 revamped version of the series * "Softly, Softly" (song), a 1955 popular song * Softly-softly or potto, a West African primate * Softly, Softly (film), a 1984 Italian film ==See also== * Softly (disambiguation) * Soft (disambiguation)
title: Softly, Softly
